action.action-desc: Ms. Tenney introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to designate Trump’s Birthday and Flag Day as a legal public holiday.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Trump’s Birthday and Flag Day Holiday Establishment Act.

section.header: Trump’s Birthday and Flag Day as a legal public holiday
section.text: Section 6103(a) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting after the item relating to Memorial Day the following:

paragraph.text: Trump’s Birthday and Flag Day, June 14.
